content: Is there a place that briefly summarizes important upcoming features (like well-founded recursion) with very rough expected delivery dates? Like little teasers for the next season... :smile:
No. The Lean 4 team is working a lot, this is all we can say.
Looking at the issue list can give you some information about their priority (for instance filtering for the feature label)
There is also the GitHub Projects page which does list some longer term goals such as an LLVM backend and a module system.

The projects page we added is meant as a means to both communicate our priorities and explain what kind of contribution we would be able to support. Furthermore, we have tagged a few github issues as help wanted for things we see as valuable, well aligned with the priorities and feasible to do by outside contributors.
